author: Special Correspondent
text:
The body of a 35-year-old man was found at Red Hills on Thursday morning. According to police, residents went inside an abandoned house on Pallikuppam Road after a foul smell started emanating from there. They grew suspicious on seeing a gunny bag and alerted the police.

Policemen from Red Hills opened the bag, and noticed the decomposed body of the man. They suspect the victim to have been murdered a few days ago.

Sentenced

A Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) court, on Thursday, sentenced the technical head of mechanical testing laboratories, Loco Works in Perambur, to one-year rigorous imprisonment in a trap case. V. Sofana Devi, XII Additional Special Judge for CBI Cases, Chennai, convicted V. Nagarajan in a case filed by the anti-corruption branch of the CBI, Chennai.
title: Man’s body found in gunny bag
